backend/main.mo: Defines user-related types such as moods, genders, relationship intents, avatars, and profiles, including text conversion helpers. Partial actor logic and additional fields are present but truncated.
feature_evidence.json: Contains structured feature evidence entries mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists prewritten summaries for many frontend files, describing their purpose and recent changes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining theme variables for light and dark modes and applying global styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document providing the mounting point and module script for the frontend SPA.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up global providers and TanStack Router routes, including public and authenticated sections with the new /closest-connections route.
frontend/src/components/app/AppFooter.ts: Empty placeholder file for a potential app footer component.
frontend/src/components/app/AppHeader.ts: Header component with app title, attribution, theme toggle, journal button, and user menu including logout and profile navigation.
frontend/src/components/app/AppLayout.ts: App layout wrapper that renders header, bottom nav, journal overlay, and routed content with support for children override.
frontend/src/components/app/BottomNav.ts: Renders a fixed bottom navigation bar with icons, highlighting the active route and showing unread notification badges.
frontend/src/components/app/FloatingJour: Displays a floating action button for composing a new journal entry when visible.
frontend/src/components/app/ThemeToggleB: Provides a button to switch between light and dark themes using next-themes.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Blocks children behind loading and login screens until Internet Identity authentication completes.
Shows the login UI with branding, randomized text, feature highlights, and an Internet Identity login button.
frontend/src/components/circle/CircleEne: Displays a generated summary of circle energy inside a styled card.
frontend/src/components/circle/CircleMem: Lists circle members with profile details, pulse scores, and controls for removing members.
frontend/src/components/circle/JoinByCod: Form allowing users to enter a share code to request joining a circle.
frontend/src/components/circle/PendingRe: Shows pending join requests with profile info and buttons to accept or decline.
frontend/src/components/circle/SafePeopl: Lets users manage up to two Safe People with recommendations, profile info, and toggling logic.
frontend/src/components/circle/ShareCode: Displays and edits a user's share code with copy, edit, and save actions tied to profile data.
frontend/src/components/common/IconActio: A button wrapped with a tooltip that supports icons and labels.
frontend/src/components/common/Progressi: Collapsible UI component showing hidden content under a trigger button.
frontend/src/components/feed/MoodCheckIn: Shows a daily mood check‑in reminder with dismiss and navigate-to-check-in actions.
frontend/src/components/feed/SilentSigna: Renders a silent signal entry showing mood, author info, and timestamp with styling.
Lets users send predefined silent signals to safe people and handles validation and status.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalD: Popover calendar selector for choosing a journal date, preventing future dates.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalE: Manages viewing, creating, and deleting journal entries for a selected date with edit restrictions.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalO: Full-screen journal sheet with rules, date picker, and entries panel, optionally resetting to today.
frontend/src/components/profile/MicroAct: Displays micro‑action suggestions based on mood history, falling back to an info prompt when insufficient data.
frontend/src/components/profile/MoodAnal: Analyzes mood history over a selectable timeframe and shows trends, distributions, concerns, and micro‑actions.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileA: Allows users to select or upload an avatar with validation, preview handling, and parent notification.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileG: Guards profile‑dependent content by loading the user's profile, handling errors, and triggering setup when needed.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Guides new users through multi‑step profile creation and saves the completed profile.
frontend/src/components/sound/SoundEffec: Plays sound effects when new notifications, feed items, join requests, or circle members appear after initial load.
frontend/src/components/status/ContextTa: UI component for selecting predefined or custom context tags with validation and soft limits.
frontend/src/components/status/MoodPicke: Searchable mood selector that groups moods by category and lets users choose one.
frontend/src/components/status/PostStatu: Modal prompting users to add a private note, showing optional micro‑action suggestions.
frontend/src/components/status/StatusCar: Displays a mood status post with author info, mood styling, timestamps, and privacy indicators.
frontend/src/constants/contextTags.ts: Defines predefined context tags and configuration limits for tag usage.
frontend/src/constants/foundationCopy.ts: Provides core app promise and boundary text strings.
frontend/src/constants/loginCopy.ts: Contains rotating login screen text and a helper to pick random phrases.
frontend/src/constants/moods.ts: Defines all mood options with labels, emojis, and categories.
frontend/src/constants/sounds.ts: Maps sound cue identifiers to asset paths for UI audio.
frontend/src/constants/systemAvatars.ts: Lists fixed system avatar metadata and helper to resolve avatar paths.
frontend/src/contexts/FloatingJournalVis: Context controlling visibility of the floating journal widget.
frontend/src/contexts/JournalOverlayCont: Context managing the open state and reset behavior of the journal overlay.
frontend/src/contexts/SoundContext.tsx: Provides a React context for sound settings, manages audio unlocking, and exposes functions to play specific sound cues.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithError.ts: Wraps useActor to provide explicit error handling and a refetch option for actor initialization failures.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook to manage authentication state, login, logout, and identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useJournal.ts: Provides queries and mutations for fetching, creating, updating, and deleting journal entries via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useMoodHistory.ts: Builds a filtered and sorted mood history for the logged-in user based on recent feed status posts.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines profile, avatar, connection, feed, and notification queries and mutations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSound.ts: Thin wrapper exposing the SoundContext hook.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and layout-safe-area adjustments.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/CirclePage.tsx: Renders the main Circle view with tabs for members, requests, joining by code, and safe people, using feed data for the energy card.
frontend/src/pages/CirclesImInPage.tsx: Shows a list of circles the user belongs to, with loading and error states and owner avatars.
frontend/src/pages/ClosestConnectionsPag: Displays ranked closest connections with avatars and explanations, handling loading and error cases.
frontend/src/pages/ComposeStatusPage.tsx: Provides a form to compose and post a mood status with audience selection, tags, and reminders.
frontend/src/pages/DailyCheckInPage.tsx: Lets users submit a daily mood check-in with audience selection, enforcing a reminder guard.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Shows the user's feed with status posts, silent signals, reminders, and refresh controls.
frontend/src/pages/HomeRoutePage.tsx: Routes users to public or authenticated home based on identity, wrapping the feed in app layout and profile checks.
frontend/src/pages/InviteCodeAuthStepPag: Handles invite-code-based auth flow, loading stored codes, prompting login, and joining a circle after authentication.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays unread and read notifications with navigation to related status pages.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays and edits the user profile, including avatar management, preferences, and pulse score.
frontend/src/pages/PublicHomePage.tsx: Public landing page allowing users to enter an invite code or start account creation.
frontend/src/pages/StartAuthPage.tsx: Starts the login/signup process using Internet Identity and redirects after authentication.
frontend/src/pages/StatusDetailPage.tsx: Shows a single status post or access errors, with navigation back to the feed.
frontend/src/utils/age.ts: Provides age calculation and date conversion utilities for profile data.
frontend/src/utils/audience.ts: Builds a deduplicated Principal audience list that always includes the author.
frontend/src/utils/circleEnergy.ts: Filters posts to the last 7 days, derives mood-based vibe categories, and generates safe, seed‑stable summary phrases.
frontend/src/utils/contextTags.ts: Normalizes and validates custom context tags, checking emptiness, length, and duplicates.
frontend/src/utils/dailyCheckInEntry.ts: Manages a one‑time sessionStorage flag for entering daily check‑in mode.
frontend/src/utils/inviteCodeSession.ts: Stores, retrieves, normalizes, and clears invite codes using sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/microActions.ts: Analyzes recent moods and context tags to generate conservative micro‑action suggestions from a small action library.
frontend/src/utils/moodAnalysis.ts: Computes mood distributions, trends, concern levels, and guidance with a non‑diagnostic disclaimer.
frontend/src/utils/moodColors.ts: Maps mood categories to Tailwind color and gradient class sets for UI styling.
frontend/src/utils/moodReminder.ts: Tracks daily dismissal of the mood reminder via localStorage and exposes show/dismiss helpers.
frontend/src/utils/profileAvatar.ts: Resolves avatar sources, validates uploads, converts files to bytes, and manages blob URL cleanup.
frontend/src/utils/shareCode.ts: Generates a six‑character uppercase alphanumeric share code without ambiguous characters.
frontend/src/utils/soundPreferences.ts: Reads and writes the user's sound‑enabled preference using localStorage with safe fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Converts between backend nanosecond timestamps and JS Dates and provides helpers for day boundaries and formatting.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended color tokens, container settings, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Tracks project version, current migration plan, architectural notes, and known issues for development coordination.
